Articles.Content:
I have created some carbon fiber reskins of some parts. I have also modified the parts in a few ways.

They are;

- lighter

- stronger

- more expensive

- more fire prone

So far there are 4 parts;

- Parachute

- Command Pod

- Standard Fuel Tank

- Winglet

I expect to add some more later.

Download Zip

Ohh these ones look very nice! I was expecting something like a random black and white pattern because in the past modelers who had no textures simply put that and said 'it\'s carbon fiber!'. Glad i was wrong =P

Define 'more fire prone'

I assume max temperature is lower than stock parts.

Very good start, I can tell you put some care into it, unlike a lot of reskins which are usually just: 'open fuelTank texture in paint, use flood fill tool.'

If I might make a suggestion, the purple tint seems a bit strange. Compare to real carbon fibre, which is mostly grey with a very slight blue tint sometimes.
So, looks awesome, but you can edit the original textures, make it different. Anyway, go(o)d job.

Very good start, I can tell you put some care into it, unlike a lot of reskins which are usually just: 'open fuelTank texture in paint, use flood fill tool.'

If I might make a suggestion, the purple tint seems a bit strange. Compare to real carbon fibre, which is mostly grey with a very slight blue tint sometimes.

I don\'t know why it looks so purple in the game. Next release I\'ll go through and change the hue and brightness unless people like it this way.
